scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p dist_deploy/hol.is dist_deploy/chusme.social && cp -r dist/hol.is/src/* dist_deploy/hol.is/ && cp -r dist/chusme.social/src/* dist_deploy/chusme.social/ && mv dist_deploy/hol.is/index.js dist_deploy/hol.is/_worker.js && mv dist_deploy/chusme.social/index.js dist_deploy/chusme.social/_worker.js && cp -r chusme.social/static dist_deploy/chusme.social/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:tsc && npm run build:prepare
scripts.deploy: echo 'Use deploy:holis or deploy:social instead' && exit 1
scripts.deploy:chusme: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist_deploy/hol.is --project-name=chus-me
scripts.deploy:holis: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist_deploy/hol.is --project-name=hol-is
scripts.deploy:social: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist_deploy/chusme.social --project-name=holis-social
